desc.p: This is part of a multi-value set which contains the price, the number of nominal held at this price & the estimation of the valuation.
This field stores the price that the nominal is held at.

This file is used to store the nominal & prices for cover call options. Should an option be accepted then the SECURITY.POSITION will be blocked to prevent trading in the nominal. The pricing information for the position is stored in this file.
The ID of this file is made up as follows:
Therefore reference 100122-1.301.30.000700-000 refers to Portfolio Account No. - 100122-1 Sub Asset Type - 301 Asset Type - 30 Security Number - 000700-000
A maximum of 20 characters may be entered.
This is part of a multi-value set which contains the price, the number of nominal held at this price & the estimation of the valuation.
This field stores the estimated valution based on the number of nominal held at the price listed.
This is part of a multi-value set which contains the price, the number of nominal held at this price & the estimation of the valuation.
This field stores the number of nominal.
